trans-unit.source: Provides user interface (UI) elements for logging in to a Web site.
trans-unit.target: 提供用户界面 (UI) 元素以便登录网站。

trans-unit.source: In this topic:
trans-unit.target: 本主题内容：

trans-unit.source: [Introduction](#introduction)
trans-unit.target: [介绍](#introduction)

trans-unit.source: [Style and Templates](#styles_and_templates)
trans-unit.target: [样式和模板](#styles_and_templates)

trans-unit.source: [Validation Groupings](#validation_groupings)
trans-unit.target: [验证分组](#validation_groupings)

trans-unit.source: [Accessibility](#accessibility)
trans-unit.target: [辅助功能](#accessibility)

trans-unit.source: [Applying CSS Styles](#applying_styles)
trans-unit.target: [应用 CSS 样式](#applying_styles)

trans-unit.source: [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax)
trans-unit.target: [声明性语法](#declarative_syntax)

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 介绍

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control is a composite control that provides all the common UI elements needed to authenticate a user on a Web site.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件是提供对 Web 站点上的用户进行身份验证所需所有常见 UI 元素的复合控件。

trans-unit.source: The following three elements are required for all login scenarios:
trans-unit.target: 以下三个元素都需要所有登录方案：

trans-unit.source: A unique user name to identify the user.
trans-unit.target: 用于标识用户的唯一用户名。

trans-unit.source: A password to verify the identity of the user.
trans-unit.target: 要验证的用户标识的密码。

trans-unit.source: A login button to send the login information to the server.
trans-unit.target: 用于向服务器发送的登录信息的登录按钮。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control also provides the following optional UI elements that support additional functions:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件还提供了以下可选 UI 元素，以便支持其他函数：

trans-unit.source: A link for a password reminder.
trans-unit.target: 对于密码提醒链接。

trans-unit.source: A Remember Me checkbox for retaining the login information between sessions.
trans-unit.target: 记住我的复选框保留会话之间的登录信息。

trans-unit.source: A Help link for users who are having trouble logging in.
trans-unit.target: 登录时出现问题的用户帮助链接。

trans-unit.source: A Register New User link that redirects users to a registration page.
trans-unit.target: 将用户重定向到的注册页注册新的用户链接。

trans-unit.source: Instruction text that appears on the login form.
trans-unit.target: 登录窗体显示的说明文本。

trans-unit.source: Custom error text that appears when the user clicks the login button without filling in the user name or password fields.
trans-unit.target: 当用户而不填充用户名称或密码字段中单击登录按钮时显示的自定义错误文本。

trans-unit.source: Custom error text that appears if the login fails.
trans-unit.target: 显示登录失败时的自定义错误文本。

trans-unit.source: A custom action that occurs when login succeeds.
trans-unit.target: 发生登录成功后的自定义操作。

trans-unit.source: A way to hide the login control if the user is already logged in to the site.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户已登录到站点隐藏 login 控件的方法。

trans-unit.source: For a table showing which controls are required and which are optional, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 显示哪些控件为必选和可选的表，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If you are not familiar with the set of login controls available in ASP.NET, see [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d) before continuing.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不熟悉的 ASP.NET 提供的登录控件集，请参阅[ASP.NET 登录控件概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d)才能继续。

trans-unit.source: For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd).
trans-unit.target: 有关与登录控件和成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅[使用成员资格管理用户](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。

trans-unit.source: Accepting user input is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 接受用户输入是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: Malicious users can send data that is intended to expose vulnerabilities or run programs that try generated passwords.
trans-unit.target: 恶意用户可以发送数据，用于公开的漏洞或运行程序会尝试生成的密码。

trans-unit.source: To improve security when working with user input, you should use the validation features of your control and secure any data providers that are configured for your control.
trans-unit.target: 为了提高安全性，处理用户输入时，应使用的控件的验证功能和安全配置的任何数据提供程序为您的控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c), [Basic Security Practices for Web Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad), and [Securing Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护登录控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)， [Web 应用程序的基本安全实践](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad)，和[保护成员资格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control uses a membership provider to obtain user credentials.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件使用成员资格提供程序来获取用户凭据。

trans-unit.source: Unless you specify otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control uses the default membership provider defined in the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 除非另有指定，否则，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件使用 Web.config 文件中定义默认成员资格提供程序。

trans-unit.source: To specify a different provider, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.MembershipProvider%2A> property to one of the membership provider names defined in your application's Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定不同的提供程序，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.MembershipProvider%2A>到其中一个成员资格提供程序名称的属性在应用程序的 Web.config 文件中定义。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Membership Providers](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[成员资格提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f)。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use a custom authentication service, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.OnAuthenticate%2A> method to call the service.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要使用自定义身份验证服务，则可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.OnAuthenticate%2A>方法来调用服务。

trans-unit.source: Styles and Templates
trans-unit.target: 样式和模板

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control is fully customizable through templates and style settings.
trans-unit.target: 外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件是通过模板和样式设置完全可自定义。

trans-unit.source: All UI text messages are also customizable through properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> class.
trans-unit.target: 所有 UI 文本消息也都是可自定义的属性通过<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>类。

trans-unit.source: The default interface text is automatically localized based on the locale setting on the server.
trans-unit.target: 默认接口文本自动进行了本地化基于服务器上的区域设置。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control is customized with templates, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> property are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件自定义模板，则<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>属性将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: In this case, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> property of each template child control directly.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>直接每个模板子控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control properties represented by text boxes, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.UserName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Password%2A>, are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> 控件属性的文本框，如表示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.UserName%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Password%2A>，页生命周期的所有阶段都可访问。

trans-unit.source: The control will pick up any changes made by the end user by means of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged> event triggered by the textboxes.
trans-unit.target: 控件将选取由最终用户的方式进行任何更改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged>由文本框触发的事件。

trans-unit.source: If you embed the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep> object, explicitly set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> property in a `Page_Load` event handler if the user is authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嵌入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>中控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep>对象，显式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>中的属性`Page_Load`事件处理程序当用户进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control does not automatically advance to the next <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep> object in this scenario.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控件没有自动前进到下一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep>在此方案中的对象。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control style properties and explains which UI element each style property affects.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件的样式属性并说明每个样式属性会影响哪些用户界面元素。

trans-unit.source: For a list of which properties each style applies to, see the documentation for the individual style properties.
trans-unit.target: 有关哪些属性的每个样式应用到的列表，请参阅的单个样式属性的文档。

trans-unit.source: Style property
trans-unit.target: 样式属性

trans-unit.source: UI element affected
trans-unit.target: 受影响的 UI 元素

trans-unit.source: The space between the control contents and the control's border.
trans-unit.target: 控件内容和控件的边框之间的空间。

trans-unit.source: Remember Me checkbox.
trans-unit.target: 记住我复选框。

trans-unit.source: Login failure text.
trans-unit.target: 登录失败文本。

trans-unit.source: Instructional text on the page that tells users how to use the control.
trans-unit.target: 告知用户如何使用控件的页面上的说明文本。

trans-unit.source: Labels for all input fields, such as text boxes.
trans-unit.target: 所有输入字段，例如文本框的标签。

trans-unit.source: Text entry input fields.
trans-unit.target: 文本输入的输入的字段。

trans-unit.source: Title text.
trans-unit.target: 标题文本。

trans-unit.source: Text displayed to the user when a login attempt is unsuccessful due to validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 由于验证错误而失败的登录尝试时向用户显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: Links to other pages.
trans-unit.target: 链接到其他页。

trans-unit.source: Login button.
trans-unit.target: 登录按钮。

trans-unit.source: Validation Groupings
trans-unit.target: 验证分组

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.UserName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Password%2A> properties have <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> controls associated with them to prevent users from submitting the page without providing required information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.UserName%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Password%2A>属性具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>与它们可以阻止用户且不提供所需的信息提交页面相关联的控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control uses a validation group so that other fields on the same page as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control can be validated separately.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件使用的验证组，以便在同一页上的其他字段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>单独验证控件。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control is used as the name of the validation group.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件用作验证组的名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control with the ID "Login1" will use a validation group name of "Login1".
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>具有 ID"Login1"控件将使用"Login1"的验证组名称。

trans-unit.source: If you want to set the validation group that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control is part of, you must template the control and change the validation group name.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要设置的验证组，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件是的一部分，您必须将控件模板和更改的验证组名称。

trans-unit.source: Applying CSS Styles
trans-unit.target: 应用 CSS 样式

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control lets you specify CSS style rules in markup.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制可用于在标记中指定 CSS 样式规则。

trans-unit.source: If you use templates to customize the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control, you can specify CSS styles in the markup in the templates.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用模板的外观进行自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件，你可以在模板中标记中指定 CSS 样式。

trans-unit.source: In that case, no extra outer table is required.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，没有额外的外部表是必需的。

trans-unit.source: You can prevent the table from being rendered by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RenderOuterTable%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以防止通过设置呈现表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RenderOuterTable%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Accessibility
trans-unit.target: 可访问性

trans-unit.source: For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何配置此控件，以使其生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).

trans-unit.source: Declarative Syntax
trans-unit.target: 声明性语法

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control to provide a UI for logging in to a Web site.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件来提供 UI 用于登录到网站。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how you can extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。

trans-unit.source: The `CustomLogin` control includes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control that lets users choose which membership provider they are authenticated with.
trans-unit.target: `CustomLogin`控件包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件使用户可以选择使用进行身份验证的成员资格提供程序。

trans-unit.source: (These providers are configured in Web.config.) In the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.OnLoggingIn%2A> method, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.MembershipProvider%2A> property is set to the selected value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: （这些提供程序配置在 Web.config 中。）在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.OnLoggingIn%2A>方法，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.MembershipProvider%2A>属性设置为的所选值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control and add that instance to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PlaceHolder> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.%23ctor%2A>构造函数来创建的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件并将添加到该实例<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PlaceHolder>控件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user is authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 验证用户的身份后出现。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate> event is raised when a user uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control to log in to a Web site.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate>用户使用时，将引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件以要求在登录到网站。

trans-unit.source: Custom authentication schemes can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate> event to authenticate users.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用自定义身份验证方案<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate>事件用户进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: When a user uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control to log in to a Web site, all data in the view state and all post data is lost.
trans-unit.target: 当用户使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件中登录到网站时中的视图状态的所有数据和所有 post 数据将丢失。

trans-unit.source: Do not perform actions in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate> event that rely on the view state.
trans-unit.target: 不执行操作中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate>根据视图状态的事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate> event to call site-specific custom authentication code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate>事件来调用特定于站点的自定义身份验证的代码。

trans-unit.source: Custom authentication schemes should set the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs.Authenticated" /> property to <see langword="true" /> to indicate that a user has been authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 自定义身份验证方案应设置<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs.Authenticated" />属性<see langword="true" />以指示用户已经过身份验证。

trans-unit.source: When a user submits his or her login information, the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> control first raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn" /> event, then the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate" /> event, and finally the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 当用户提交他或她登录信息，<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" />控件首先引发<see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn" />事件，则<see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate" />事件，并最后<see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn" />事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of padding inside the borders of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> 控件边框内的填充量。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space (in pixels) between the contents of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> control and the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> control's border.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> 控件的内容与 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> 控件的边框之间的空间量（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="1" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="1" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.BorderPadding%2A> property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.BorderPadding%2A>属性存储视图状态中。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.BorderPadding" /> property is set to a value less than -1.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.BorderPadding" /> 属性被设置为小于 -1 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object that defines the settings for the Remember Me check box.
trans-unit.target: 获取对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 对象的引用，它定义“记住我”复选框的设置。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that defines the style settings for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> control's Remember Me check box.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 的引用，它定义 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> 控件的“记住我”复选框的样式设置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CheckBoxStyle%2A> property gets a reference to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that you use to change the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control's Remember Me check box.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CheckBoxStyle%2A>属性获取的引用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>对象，供你用来更改的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件的记住我复选框。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>对象返回。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `CheckBoxStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>类 (例如， `CheckBoxStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CheckBoxStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式设置此属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CheckBoxStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用的设置包括自定义的背景色、 文本颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CheckBoxStyle%2A> property defines the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CheckBoxStyle%2A>属性定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeText%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CheckBoxStyle%2A> property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: 样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CheckBoxStyle%2A>属性合并的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。

trans-unit.source: Any settings made in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CheckBoxStyle%2A> property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: 在中所做的任何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CheckBoxStyle%2A>属性重写的属性中的相应设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control style properties are overridden by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CheckBoxStyle%2A> settings:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件样式属性重写了<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CheckBoxStyle%2A>设置：

trans-unit.source: When you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CheckBoxStyle%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用模板定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CheckBoxStyle%2A>属性不起作用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the text color of the Remember Me check box to blue and the font style to italic by setting properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CheckBoxStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置的文本颜色的记住我复选框以蓝色和字体样式为斜体通过设置属性的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>所引用对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CheckBoxStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Creates the individual controls that make up the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> control and associates event handlers with their events.
trans-unit.target: 创建组成 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> 控件的各个控件，并将事件处理程序与它们各自的事件相关联。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateChildControls%2A> method creates instances of the controls that compose the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateChildControls%2A>方法创建的控件的撰写实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the location of an image to display next to the link to a registration page for new users.
trans-unit.target: 获取显示在新用户的注册页链接旁边的图像的位置。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image to display.
trans-unit.target: 要显示的图像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of a link to a registration page for new users.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置新用户注册页的链接文本。

trans-unit.source: The text of the link to the new-user registration page.
trans-unit.target: 新用户注册页的链接文本。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A> property contains the text of a link to the registration page for the site.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A>属性包含指向站点的注册页的文本。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the registration page is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 注册页的 URL 中指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserUrl%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserUrl%2A> is empty, the text in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A> property is displayed to the user, but is not formatted as a link.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserUrl%2A>为空中的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A>属性显示给用户，但未格式化的链接的形式。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A> property is empty, a link to the registration page is not available to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A>属性为空，则在注册页的链接不是可供用户。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A> property to "Register new user..."
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A>属性设置为"注册新的用户..."

trans-unit.source: This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the new-user registration page.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置新用户注册页的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the new-user registration page.
trans-unit.target: 新用户注册页的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserUrl%2A> property contains the URL of the new-user registration page for the Web site.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserUrl%2A>属性包含网站的新用户注册页的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A> property contains the text used for the link.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A>属性包含用于链接的文本。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A> property is empty, the link to the registration page is unavailable to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserText%2A>属性为空，则不向用户注册页链接。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserUrl%2A> property to "register.aspx".
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.CreateUserUrl%2A>"register.aspx"的属性。

trans-unit.source: This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the page displayed to the user when a login attempt is successful.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在登录尝试成功时向用户显示的页面的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the page the user is redirected to when a login attempt is successful.
trans-unit.target: 登录尝试成功时用户被重定向到的页面的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DestinationPageUrl%2A> property specifies the page that is displayed when a login attempt is successful.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DestinationPageUrl%2A>属性指定当登录尝试不成功时显示的页。

trans-unit.source: The default behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control is to return the user to the referring page, or to the page defined in the `defaultUrl` attribute of the element in the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 默认行为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制是将用户返回到引用的页中，或中定义的页`defaultUrl`的 Web.config 文件中的元素的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DestinationPageUrl%2A> property overrides the default behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control, as well as the `defaultUrl` setting made in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DestinationPageUrl%2A>属性重写的默认行为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件，以及`defaultUrl`所做的配置文件中的设置。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DestinationPageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DestinationPageUrl%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The Page_Load method is used to attach the URL of the referring page to the URL of the destination page so that the destination page can return the user to the original page if desired.
trans-unit.target: Page_Load 方法用于将引用的页面的 URL 附加到目标页的 URL，以便目标页可以将用户返回到原始页必要。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display a check box to enable the user to control whether a persistent cookie is sent to their browser.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否显示复选框以使用户可以控制是否向浏览器发送持久性 Cookie。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the check box; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果显示复选框，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A> property is set to `true`, the text contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeText%2A> property is displayed on the page, along with a Remember Me check box.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A>属性设置为`true`中, 包含的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeText%2A>页面上显示属性，以及记住我复选框。

trans-unit.source: When the user selects the Remember Me check box, the authentication cookie sent to his or her computer persists so that the user is automatically authenticated on future visits to the site.
trans-unit.target: 当用户选择记住我复选框，发送到他或她的计算机的身份验证 cookie 仍然存在，以便将来访问站点上自动验证用户。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeSet%2A> property is set by the selection in the Remember Me check box.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeSet%2A>属性由设置所选内容中记住我复选框。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A> is `false`, a Remember Me check box is not displayed on the page and the user has no way to control whether the authentication cookie persists or not.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A>是`false`、 记住我复选框不会显示在页面和用户是否身份验证 cookie 仍然存在或不具有不能控制。

trans-unit.source: You can still set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeSet%2A> property to `true` to send a persistent authentication cookie to the user's browser without displaying the check box.
trans-unit.target: 您仍可以设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeSet%2A>属性`true`发送到用户的浏览器的持久性身份验证 cookie，而不显示复选框。

trans-unit.source: There are inherent security risks with setting a persistent authentication cookie on a user's browser.
trans-unit.target: 没有与用户的浏览器上设置持久性身份验证 cookie 的固有安全风险。

trans-unit.source: You should determine whether these security risks are acceptable to your site.
trans-unit.target: 你应该确定是否可以接受你的站点的这些安全风险。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeSet%2A> property to `true` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A> property to `false`, users visiting your Web site from public browsers, as in Internet cafes for example, can accidentally leave persistent authentication cookies behind and the next user of the browser will be able to access your Web site using the previous user's credentials.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeSet%2A>属性`true`和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A>属性`false`、 从公共浏览器中，如下所示吧例如，可以意外留下持久身份验证 cookie 的 Internet 访问你的网站的用户和下一步的浏览器的用户将能够访问您的网站以使用以前用户的凭据。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example disables the Remember Me check box by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例禁用了记住我复选框通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the action that occurs when a login attempt fails.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当登录尝试失败时发生的操作。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginFailureAction" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginFailureAction" /> 枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginFailureAction.Refresh" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginFailureAction.Refresh" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureAction%2A> property defines the behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control when the user does not successfully log in to the Web site.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureAction%2A>属性定义的行为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制当用户没有成功登录到网站。

trans-unit.source: The default behavior reloads the page and displays the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A> property to alert the user that the login attempt failed.
trans-unit.target: 默认行为重新加载页面，并显示的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A>属性来提醒用户的登录尝试失败。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureAction%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginFailureAction.RedirectToLoginPage>, the user is redirected to the login page defined in the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureAction%2A>设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginFailureAction.RedirectToLoginPage>，用户定向到 Web.config 文件中定义的登录页。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureAction%2A> property both declaratively and in code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureAction%2A>属性以声明方式和代码。

trans-unit.source: The selected value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginFailureAction" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 所选的值不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginFailureAction" /> 枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed when a login attempt fails.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当登录尝试失败时显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text to display to the user when a login attempt fails.
trans-unit.target: 当登录尝试失败时向用户显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Your login attempt has failed.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为“您的登录尝试失败。

trans-unit.source: Please try again."
trans-unit.target: 请重试。”

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A> property specifies the string that is displayed when a login attempt fails.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A>属性指定的登录尝试失败时显示的字符串。

trans-unit.source: If you define a template for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control, you can indicate where on the template to display the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A> property by using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control and giving that control the ID "FailureText".
trans-unit.target: 如果你定义的模板<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>其中要显示的模板上的控件，可以指示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A>属性使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>控件并提供相关的控件 ID"FailureText"。

trans-unit.source: When you use a template, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A> property is not applied to the text specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用模板，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A>属性不应用于中指定的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the property is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 属性的默认文本进行了本地化根据服务器的当前区域设置。

trans-unit.source: For security reasons, the login failure text should not include a specific reason for the failure.
trans-unit.target: 出于安全原因，登录失败文本不应包含失败的特定原因。

trans-unit.source: For example, an error message such as "Password not valid for user \<username>" reveals to a potential attacker that \<username> is a user on the system.
trans-unit.target: 例如，例如错误消息"的用户密码无效\<用户名 >"显示给潜在的攻击者，\<用户名 > 是在系统上的用户。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Display Safe Error Messages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f70ac33-6e11-4e98-ab7d-bae9c0e7eefa).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 显示安全错误消息](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f70ac33-6e11-4e98-ab7d-bae9c0e7eefa)。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A> property to "There was an error while logging you in.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A>属性设置为"出错时中的日志记录你。

trans-unit.source: Please try again.".
trans-unit.target: 请重试。"。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of error text in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对属性集合的引用，这些属性定义 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> 控件中错误文本的外观。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that contains properties that define the appearance of error text.
trans-unit.target: 对包含定义错误文本外观的属性的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A> property gets a reference to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object that you use to change the appearance of login failure text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A>属性获取的引用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象，供你用来更改登录失败文本的外观。

trans-unit.source: The default is to display the text in red.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是以红色显示文本。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象返回。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class (for example, `FailureTextStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>类 (例如， `FailureTextStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FailureTextStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式设置此属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `FailureTextStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用的设置包括自定义的背景色、 文本颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A> property defines the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A>属性定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureText%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A> property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: 样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A>属性合并的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。

trans-unit.source: Any settings made in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A> property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: 在中所做的任何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A>属性重写的属性中的相应设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control style properties are overridden by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A> settings:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件样式属性重写了<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A>设置：

trans-unit.source: When you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用模板定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A>属性不起作用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example specifies the login failure text style by setting the background and text color properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.FailureTextStyle%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: Gets the location of an image to display next to the link to the login Help page.
trans-unit.target: 获取要在登录帮助页面的链接旁显示的图像的位置。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image to display.
trans-unit.target: 要显示的图像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of a link to the login Help page.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置登录帮助页链接的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text of the link to the login Help page.
trans-unit.target: 登录帮助页链接的文本。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageText%2A> property contains the link text to the login Help page for the site.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageText%2A>属性包含该网站的登录帮助页的链接文本。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the login Help page is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 登录帮助页的 URL 中指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageUrl%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageUrl%2A> is empty, the text in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageText%2A> property is displayed to the user on the page, but is not formatted as a link.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageUrl%2A>为空中的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageText%2A>向在页上，用户显示的属性，但未格式化的链接的形式。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageText%2A> property is empty, the link to the login Help page is not available to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageText%2A>属性为空，登录帮助页的链接，不能给用户。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageUrl%2A> property contains the URL of the login Help page for the Web site.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageUrl%2A>属性包含网站的登录帮助页的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageText%2A> property contains the text used for the link.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageText%2A>属性包含用于链接的文本。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageUrl%2A> is empty, text in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageText%2A> property is displayed to the user, but is not formatted as a link.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageUrl%2A>为空中的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageText%2A>属性显示给用户，但未格式化的链接的形式。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageText%2A> property is empty, the link to the login Help page is not available to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.HelpPageText%2A>属性为空，登录帮助页的链接，不能给用户。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于显示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> 控件的模板。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> that contains the template for displaying the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />，包含用于显示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> 控件的模板。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A> property contains the template that defines how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A>属性包含模板，它定义如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>向用户显示控件。

trans-unit.target: 下表列出了使用中的必选和可选控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件模板。

trans-unit.source: ID or command name
trans-unit.target: ID 或命令名称

trans-unit.source: Control type
trans-unit.target: 控件类型

trans-unit.target: 必需/可选

trans-unit.target: 实现任何控件<xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>，包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>，或自定义或第三方控件。

trans-unit.source: Required
trans-unit.target: 必需

trans-unit.target: 实现任何控件<xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>，包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>，或自定义或第三方控件。

trans-unit.source: Required
trans-unit.target: 必需

trans-unit.source: Optional
trans-unit.target: Optional

trans-unit.source: Any control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl>.
trans-unit.target: 实现任何控件<xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl>。

trans-unit.source: Optional
trans-unit.target: Optional

trans-unit.source: Any control that causes event bubbling.
trans-unit.target: 导致事件冒泡任何控件。

trans-unit.source: Optional
trans-unit.target: Optional

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control throws an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception if the layout template does not contain the required controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件将引发<xref:System.Web.HttpException>异常如果布局模板不包含所需的控件。

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown if you give an optional control ID to a control of the wrong type; however, the control is subsequently ignored by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: 在可选控件 ID 赋予错误类型; 的控件不引发任何异常但是，该控件随后将被忽略<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。

trans-unit.source: The login control can be any control that causes event bubbling, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>.
trans-unit.target: 登录控件均可以是导致事件上传方法，如任何控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>。

trans-unit.source: The control's command name property must be set to "Login".
trans-unit.target: 控件的命令名称属性必须设置为"登录"。

trans-unit.source: This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the control state to restore.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示要还原的控件状态的对象。

trans-unit.source: Restores view-state information from a previous request that was saved with the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SaveViewState" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 从用 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SaveViewState" /> 方法保存的上一个请求还原视图状态信息。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="savedState" /> is not a valid <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.ViewState" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="savedState" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.ViewState" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user logs in to the Web site and has been authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 在用户登录到网站并进行身份验证后出现。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn> event is raised after the authentication provider checks the user's credentials and the authentication cookie is queued to send to the browser in the next response.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn>之后身份验证提供程序将检查用户的凭据和身份验证 cookie 排队等待发送到下一步的响应中的浏览器，将引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn> event to provide additional processing, such as accessing per-user data, after the user is authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn>事件，以便提供额外的处理，例如用户进行身份验证之后访问每个用户数据。

trans-unit.source: When a user submits his or her login information, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control first raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn> event, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate> event, and finally the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn> event.
trans-unit.target: 当用户提交他或她登录信息，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件首先引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn>事件，则<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate>事件，并最后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn>事件。

trans-unit.source: When a user uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control to log in to a Web site, all data in the view state and all post data is lost.
trans-unit.target: 当用户使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件中登录到网站时中的视图状态的所有数据和所有 post 数据将丢失。

trans-unit.source: Do not perform actions in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn> event that rely on the view state.
trans-unit.target: 不执行操作中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn>根据视图状态的事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn> event to call a site-specific method that keeps a record of user logins.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn>事件调用记录的用户登录名的特定于站点方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user submits login information, before authentication takes place.
trans-unit.target: 在用户未进行身份验证而提交登录信息时出现。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn> event is raised when a user submits login information but before the user is authenticated on the Web site.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn>当用户提交登录信息，但在用户进行身份验证网站上之前，将引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn> event to set up any information that you need before authenticating a user.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn>事件来设置对用户进行身份验证之前，你需要的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: You can cancel a login attempt during the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn> event by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以取消的登录尝试期间<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn>事件通过设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>对象传递给`true`。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn> event is raised, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate> event and then the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn> event.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn>引发事件时，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件都将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate>事件，然后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn> event to ensure that the user has entered a well-formed email address in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.UserName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn>事件，以确保用户输入中的格式正确的电子邮件地址<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.UserName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If not, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn> event cancels the login attempt and displays an error message using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.InstructionText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有，则<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn>事件取消的登录尝试，并显示错误消息使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.InstructionText%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Represents the command name associated with the login button.
trans-unit.target: 表示与登录按钮关联的命令名。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonCommandName> is a read-only field and the default value is "Login".
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginButtonCommandName> 为只读字段，默认值为"登录"。

trans-unit.source: This value is passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.OnBubbleEvent%2A>, and if the value is "Login", the control attempts to log in the current user.
trans-unit.target: 此值传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.OnBubbleEvent%2A>，如果值为"登录"，尝试登录当前的用户控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of an image to use for the login button.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置登录按钮使用的图像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image used for the login button.
trans-unit.target: 登录按钮使用的图像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate" /> event to authenticate the user.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate" /> 事件以验证用户身份。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.OnAuthenticate%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate> event.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate> event to implement a custom authentication scheme.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.OnAuthenticate%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.OnAuthenticate%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.OnAuthenticate(System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.OnAuthenticate(System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.OnAuthenticate(System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.OnAuthenticate(System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件源。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> containing the data for the event.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether to pass an event up the page's user interface (UI) server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否将事件沿页面的用户界面 (UI) 服务器控件层次结构向上传递。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件已被取消，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.OnBubbleEvent%2A> method implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to pass events from child controls to the page hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.OnBubbleEvent%2A>方法实现<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法将从子控件的事件传递到页层次结构。

trans-unit.source: If the current event is posted by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control Login button, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control attempts to log in to the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前事件发布<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制登录按钮，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件尝试登录到网站。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the password recovery page is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.PasswordRecoveryUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的密码恢复页面的 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.PasswordRecoveryUrl%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.PasswordRecoveryUrl%2A> is empty, the text in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.PasswordRecoveryText%2A> property is displayed to the user, but is not formatted as a link.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.PasswordRecoveryUrl%2A>为空中的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.PasswordRecoveryText%2A>属性显示给用户，但未格式化的链接的形式。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.PasswordRecoveryText%2A> property is empty, the link to the password recovery page is not available to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.PasswordRecoveryText%2A>属性为空，则不向用户提供到密码恢复页链接。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Password."

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.PasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A> property contains the error message displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control on the login page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.PasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A>属性包含中显示的错误消息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>的登录页上的控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.PasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A> property value is displayed only when both the following conditions are true:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.PasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A>仅在满足以下条件时会显示属性值：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control is present on the page.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>控件是在页上存在。

trans-unit.source: The Password text box is left blank by the user.

trans-unit.source: The default text for the property is localized based on the server's current locale.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.PasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.UserNameRequiredErrorMessage%2A> values are wrapped in a validation group within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: 同时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.PasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.UserNameRequiredErrorMessage%2A>值包装在中的验证组<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。

trans-unit.source: For these values to display, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ValidationGroup%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control must be set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示，这些值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ValidationGroup%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>控件必须设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to send a persistent authentication cookie to the user's browser.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将持久性身份验证 Cookie 发送到用户的浏览器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to send a persistent authentication cookie; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果发送持久性身份验证 Cookie，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeSet%2A> property is `true`, the authentication cookie sent to the user's computer is set to expire in 50 years, making it a persistent cookie that will be used when the user next visits the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeSet%2A>属性是`true`，发送到用户的计算机的身份验证 cookie 已设置为过期 50 在年中，因而当用户下一步访问网站时将使用持久性 cookie。

trans-unit.source: Because the authentication cookie will be present on the user's computer, the user will be considered already authenticated and will not have to log in to the Web site again.
trans-unit.target: 由于身份验证 cookie 将存在于用户的计算机上，用户将被视为已通过身份验证，并不会再次登录到网站。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A> property is `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeSet%2A> property is set to the value of the check box displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A>属性是`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeSet%2A>属性设置为向用户显示复选框的值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A> property is `false`, a Remember Me check box is not displayed on the page and the user has no way to control whether the authentication cookie is persistent.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A>属性是`false`、 记住我复选框不会显示在页面和用户具有不能控制是否是持久性的身份验证 cookie。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeSet%2A> property is `true`, the authentication cookie sent to the user's browser will be a persistent cookie.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeSet%2A>属性是`true`，发送到用户的浏览器的身份验证 cookie 将持久性 cookie。

trans-unit.source: If the user logs out of the Web site using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus> control, the persistent cookie is cleared from the user's computer and the user will have to log in to the site on the next visit.
trans-unit.target: 如果在用户登录网站利用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus>控制，则持久性 cookie 清除从用户的计算机和用户将需要在下一步访问登录到站点。

trans-unit.source: There are inherent security risks with setting a persistent authentication cookie on a user's browser.
trans-unit.target: 没有与用户的浏览器上设置持久性身份验证 cookie 的固有安全风险。

trans-unit.source: You should determine whether these security risks are acceptable to your site.
trans-unit.target: 你应该确定是否可以接受你的站点的这些安全风险。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeSet%2A> property to `true` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A> property to `false`, users visiting your Web site from public browsers, as in Internet cafes for example, can accidentally leave persistent authentication cookies behind and the next user of the browser will be able to access your Web site using the previous user's credentials.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeSet%2A>属性`true`和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DisplayRememberMe%2A>属性`false`、 从公共浏览器中，如下所示吧例如，可以意外留下持久身份验证 cookie 的 Internet 访问你的网站的用户和下一步的浏览器的用户将能够访问您的网站以使用以前用户的凭据。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the label for the Remember Me check box.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置“记住我”复选框的标签文本。

trans-unit.source: The text of the label for the Remember Me check box.
trans-unit.target: “记住我”复选框的标签文本。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Remember me next time."
trans-unit.target: 默认值为“下次记住我。”

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeText%2A> property contains the text of the label for the Remember Me <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.RememberMeText%2A>属性包含标签的文本的记住我<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the property is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 属性的默认文本进行了本地化根据服务器的当前区域设置。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The HMTL writer.
trans-unit.target: HTML 编写器。

trans-unit.source: Renders the login form using the specified HTML writer.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 HTML 编写器呈现登录窗体。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control encloses rendered HTML in a <see langword="table" /> element in order to apply inline styles.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件是否将呈现的 HTML 包含在 <see langword="table" /> 元素中，以便应用内联样式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control encloses rendered HTML in a <see langword="table" /> element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件将呈现的 HTML 包含在 <see langword="true" /> 元素中，则为 <see langword="table" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: In order to make inline style properties such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> apply to all the HTML that is rendered for the control, ASP.NET encloses the rendered HTML in a `table` element.
trans-unit.target: 为了使内联样式属性，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>适用于所有控件呈现的 HTML，ASP.NET 将中呈现的 HTML`table`元素。

trans-unit.source: If you do not want the outer `table` element to be rendered, set this property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果不希望外部`table`元素呈现，将此属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: In that case, if you try to set inline style properties that apply to the whole control, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，如果你尝试设置应用于整个控件的样式属性的内联，则引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Saves any state that was modified after the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState" /> method was invoked.
trans-unit.target: 保存调用 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState" /> 方法后修改的任何状态。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the current view state of the control; otherwise, if there is no view state associated with the control, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含该控件的当前视图状态的对象；如果没有与该控件关联的视图状态，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> containing the design-time data for the control.
trans-unit.target: 包含控件的设计时数据的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets design-time data for a control.
trans-unit.target: 为控件设置设计时数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag" /> value that corresponds to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对应于 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This property is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此属性主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag.Table" />.
trans-unit.target: 始终返回 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag.Table" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.TagKey%2A> property to determine the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag> value that is associated with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.TagKey%2A>属性来确定<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag>与关联的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。

trans-unit.source: This property is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此属性主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of text boxes in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对属性集合的引用，这些属性定义 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login" /> 控件中文本框的外观。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that contains properties that define the appearance of text boxes.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 的引用，它包含定义文本框外观的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.TextBoxStyle%2A> property defines the appearance of the User name and Password <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.TextBoxStyle%2A>属性定义的用户名和密码的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>中控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>对象返回。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `TextBoxStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>类 (例如， `TextBoxStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `TextBoxStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式设置此属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `TextBoxStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用的设置包括自定义的背景色、 文本颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.TextBoxStyle%2A> property defines the appearance of the user name and password text boxes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.TextBoxStyle%2A>属性定义的用户名称和密码文本框的外观。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.TextBoxStyle%2A> property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: 样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.TextBoxStyle%2A>属性合并的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。

trans-unit.source: Any settings made in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.TextBoxStyle%2A> property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control.
trans-unit.target: 在中所做的任何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.TextBoxStyle%2A>属性重写的属性中的相应设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> style properties are overridden by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.TextBoxStyle%2A> settings:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>样式属性重写了<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.TextBoxStyle%2A>设置：
